website_summaries.verdict: Sharp scissors designed to cut leather, art/craft materials, and carpet.
cons: Scissors aren't the highest quality, and a few owners find fault with them for heavy-duty jobs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and cut
customer_reviews.text: The scissor was big enough and easy to use. I read other reviews and went with middle Size for My project and it was perfect. I was cutting the leather tops Off a pair of boots- multiple thin layers of leather. Not one Knick! Cut was straight and sure! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs to own at least one pair of fine scissors in a lifetime
customer_reviews.text: These are the finest scissors I have ever used. I cut the rug padding like it was soft butter. I also removed akll the labels off my nice towels and wanted it to be a really clean cut and it was. They are big and a bit intimidating at first... but just take them around the block once and you'll never let go.
customer_reviews.author: Egan

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty comes to mind after using these pretty extensively for a couple of weeks
customer_reviews.text: These are well designed and well made. Heavy duty comes to mind after using these pretty extensively for a couple of weeks. These were used to cut 20 ft rolls of insulation into 4 ft sections. Worked very well especially when stud wall areas were not at 16" centers. After using to install around 800 sq ft of insulation, shears still very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shears
customer_reviews.text: Very good size, heavy duty, very sharp and easy to use. Arrives in a nice storage box with plastic cover for the points. I used this to cut very heavy carpet padding.
customer_reviews.author: CS in Alabama

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of scissors I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors really are incredible! I have used them to shorten the length of several pairs of jeans that I own that are just way too long for me. Denim can be a heavy, or thick type of material, and these scissors cut through with precision. They may, or could feel heavy for some hands, but they certainly get the job done. So very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Deirdre A Simon

customer_reviews.title: This product is awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome!!! I needed to cut up an old carpet. I was pleasantly surprised at the ease of use. The scissors cut right through it like paper. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth H.

customer_reviews.title: Really excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous scissors! Nice heft to them, smooth action, very sharp. I have been using them on everything from garment-weight leather to fabric to snipping thread when I can't find my thread snippers. Really happy with these. Astonished by the price! Much nicer than more expensive scissors I've had in the past. Also the gold handles look very classy, and when I've got a bunch of stuff on my workbench they are easy to spot!
customer_reviews.author: mms

customer_reviews.title: Great heavy {and pretty} scissors ❤️
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of scissors, they have some weight to them which I like and they are very very sharp. If I had a complaint it would only be that the don’t open as wide as some other scissors do. Other than that they are great, I feel these will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors came so quickly and they were beautiful and weighted. They looked exactly like the picture. Very heavy and feel so good quality. Beautiful in person. The box states that it comes from China but the box does not have an odor and shipped quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cut and process soft crabs there too long for my need and are not solid, they're two piece put together with small Gap areas that leaves room for rust I'm sure they're fine for craft and indoor use but no good for what I'm using them for Went with solid stainless steel Fiskars. Much better for us
customer_reviews.author: D0L

customer_reviews.title: I LIVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this set!!! I was concerned about the quality when I saw the pricing, but I’ve been using them all day, every day for over a month now and they’re still sharp and good to go. The small scissors are great to use while I’m sewing on a machine!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Hennemuth

customer_reviews.title: Great shears
customer_reviews.text: Great shears, high quality. I have cut cloth, gasket material and auto insulation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brillinger

customer_reviews.title: Not for delicate fabrics.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, it handles any fabric with no problem. the only problem was the metal it got rusty very quick, i handle lots of expensive fabrics for my Upholstery shop, and that can be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Martin

customer_reviews.title: Nice scissors!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to get my husband some new fabric scissors and these worked out amazingly. We both love using them on our sewing projects. They cut all fabric (that we’ve used so far) so easily and clean. The scissors you use can really make or break your project and these are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Snelso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful gold color. Looks more expensive than it actually cost. The blades are sharp and the scissors them self feel heavy like they were made very well. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni M.

customer_reviews.title: Not great for leather
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product to cut leather for a project I'm doing. The scissors are still hard to use and requires a lot of effort to cut the leather, which is about 0.093 inches thick. I don't recommend this product for leather greater that 3/32nd inches.
customer_reviews.author: Elkman

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Not too heavy. Value for money. As described by vendor.
customer_reviews.author: theona knight

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Liked it was heavy duty, didn't like or know if the plastic covering is suppose to stay over hinge nut/ bolt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Scissors
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints with these scissors. Besides they look awesome and elegant, they do their job very efficiently. I use them to cut mostly cardboard, and trust they exceed in that job! I never tried them in anything else, so I can give you a further review.
customer_reviews.author: carlos4nyc

customer_reviews.title: If you would asked me, I would have said from germany...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best things to come out of China. Nice solid feel to them, balanced. I uqve huge hands and fingere and these had nice roomy holes to operate in. And share as sharp could be. Snipped 5-6 oz leather easily with little effort
customer_reviews.author: steve p.

customer_reviews.title: Clean cuts, sturdy construction. oiled blades.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, sharp, and they come oiled. These things are wonderful. I used them to clean cut some thick leather gloves and they cut clean lines with no fray. Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Ian JK

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty shears
customer_reviews.text: Perfect heavy duty shears for cutting leather upholstery for automotive. They cut heavy waxed canvas like paper. Stern and physically heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Very sharp
customer_reviews.text: They might be bulky but they are very sharp and sturdy! I used them to cut jeans into shorts and had no problems. They don't snag at all. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Super scissors...excellent heavy duty construction....the finishing work on the scissors is beautiful. They feel great in the hand and cut with just the tip or in a full stroke. Passed my double thick canvas cut without any effort. These will last a lifetime of heavy work.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Kusto

customer_reviews.title: These are some darn good shears. No one gets to borrow them.
customer_reviews.text: These wouldbe whatmymom would have called her "good shears"... and were off limits to everyone else. These are awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Mike64

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful. They cut thru the 3 inch mattress toppers effortlessly. They are heavy but that makes them sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: 3Ob1v7

customer_reviews.title: SATISFIED CUSTOMER...
customer_reviews.text: They were true to size, sharp and with a screw that if I ever needed to sharpen them I could. I have no complaints..
customer_reviews.author: NELLIE WATTS

customer_reviews.title: excellent scissors, well finished
customer_reviews.text: excellent scissors, well finished, strong, beautiful, and serves all purposes. I recommend it, especially for those who work with tailoring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: professional quality
customer_reviews.text: had been looking for a heavy duty professional quality pair of scissors for a while. this is it. these are the kind that will last a lifetime. razor sharp and will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: thomas dimond

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and very sturdy! The best scissors in the house. Have had them for over a year now and the cut quality has not declined nor it's appearance.
customer_reviews.author: IleeC

customer_reviews.title: Great for the big jobs
customer_reviews.text: I've really put them through the paces and they've worked perfectly. I wouldn't give them up or trade them.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Sexton

customer_reviews.title: Nut include some kind of lubricant with the sheer.
customer_reviews.text: It has gotten stiff and can hardly open and closed without hurting my fingers. I have in the past few days return to my old pair of scissors. I bought this pair because the blades are longer and could cut larger portion of fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Grace A.

customer_reviews.title: Decent, but not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had 2 defective pairs. They cut well, but overall they start to hurt my hand after using them. Typically used on cotton cord
customer_reviews.author: Tryer and DIYer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good weight feels nice but the scissors are sharp towards the tip and towards the screw...the middle part was very dull and didn’t make a clean cut on my fabrics sadly
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Tuiza

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and stromg
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it because I am fed up with breaking the handles of all the scissors I has an integrated metal handle and adjustable tightening screw. Good scissors!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for cutting insulation. Works excellent, but be careful, very sharp.
customer_reviews.author: David C. Crandall

customer_reviews.title: One sturdy scissors
customer_reviews.text: It seemed I'd go through a scissors every couple months until I got this bad boy. Sharp and well built.
customer_reviews.author: Judy V.

customer_reviews.title: Good for fabric including denim.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for fabric. Good quality. Sharp blades and fit comfortably in my hand.
customer_reviews.author: shari

customer_reviews.title: Thrift shop uses it to cut up uniforms and it works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: Its like the scissors my grandmother used when she was sewing. It cuts through cloth like butter!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, sharp, accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cut 1/4" foam tiles for flooring. Allowed me to make easy and straight cuts in that dense material. Very well built, worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: vectorizer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and cut very well.
customer_reviews.text: Works great cutting a medium carpet. Would recommend them to family.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: I love them
customer_reviews.text: I have tried them and the cut material super well. I have not used them a lot so , cant really say a whole lot, other than so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: They are made for a gorilla
customer_reviews.text: They are so heavy. If you have small hands and any kind of issue's like Arthritis or Trigger Finger. These are probably not the best choice for you. :(
customer_reviews.author: Toni C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Scissors! They work better than any scissors I have ever used. They work excellent for cutting any fabric. I recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product,well made
customer_reviews.text: The old carpet didn't stand a chance. Well made and durable thanks
customer_reviews.author: char blose

customer_reviews.title: Their size and quality make it easy for older hands to use for domestic purposes.
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable to grasp and capable of cutting any thickness of cloth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut great for less.
customer_reviews.text: These are hard to beat for the price. I do leather work as a hobby, and couldn’t afford $100 scissors to use occasionally. These are sharp, they make precise cuts, and they are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kennith Hill

customer_reviews.title: Work as advertise!
customer_reviews.text: Best scissors ever, easily beat my last pair of high dollar scissors
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These will cut through anything! Luv, bought for trimming, cutting fabric. I only wish i had gotten a smaller size as my hands arent that large, but at the time i was thinking go big or go home, so u may want to keep that in mind. But amazing scissors especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mary rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Scissors that don’t cut
customer_reviews.text: The tiny snips are great, but the actual scissors suck. Been a tailor for 12 years and never have I encounter a pair brand new, freshly opened, unused, pair of blades that do not cut correctly. It’s as though The blades do not align so the fabric just slips between them which become difficult to cut.
customer_reviews.author: Rolend G.

customer_reviews.title: Smooth cutting action
customer_reviews.text: I really like these scissors . Sharp and very smooth action . I think they’re very good for the price and at least look like they’ll last .
customer_reviews.author: mjh

customer_reviews.title: Great for embroidery
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves them! She is learning to embroider and these two pair of scissors work great.
customer_reviews.author: janey

customer_reviews.title: SUPER STRONG AND POWERFUL CUTTERS
customer_reviews.text: SUPER STRONG AND POWERFUL CUTTERS - if you want powerful cutters - these will do it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: it is exactly what i need
customer_reviews.text: i am using it for upholstery materials like fabric and leatheret ,and it is doing excelent
customer_reviews.author: Godfrey Solomon

customer_reviews.title: Mama for sure.
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I named her mama. She is truly the mother of all scissors lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best scissors in the office!
customer_reviews.text: When I received these, I knew I had to put my name on them. The quality is like WOW! I look forward to citing things with them... partially because I want to show them off! Haha They look like they cost so much more than they do. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for these incredible scissors!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors surpassed my expectations. Given the price I assumed they'd be adequate but they are amazing! Sturdy yet not too bulky. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia L. Macias

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable..
customer_reviews.text: This is a amazing scissors. Cuts my leather the way I want it.. strong and reliable if you are into fabric or leather.. I would have one of these.. for small to large projects
customer_reviews.author: Mounika Krishna Kolla

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors just what I needed to finish a job
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors just what I needed to finish a job,cutting material for bed headbands. They are great. Recommend thfm to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: A real scissor
customer_reviews.text: Very substantial. Smooth operation. Longer than I expected, but that’s my error.
customer_reviews.author: Dancing

customer_reviews.title: Sharp.
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, good grip and weight balance = good to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Ragnar  Traustason

customer_reviews.title: Large shears
customer_reviews.text: My husband will use them to cut insulation.. he is very pleased with then....
customer_reviews.author: flyboyzmama

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty Scissors
customer_reviews.text: I gave the overall product 4 stars because the scissors looked like they were used/returned. Overall nice heavy duty quality scissors. Cut through army fatigue fabric, will be tested on leather shortly.
customer_reviews.author: jeneen nicole

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to find shears this large in my area, ...
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to find shears this large in my area, none of the home improvement or fabric stores carried anything this large. They are solid and sharp!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher R.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed with quality materials
customer_reviews.text: Cuts through carpet, leather, heavy fabric stacks - like a hot knife through butter. Takes and holds a good edge - stays sharp. For a large scissors, is very accurate and maneuverable. Really well made.
customer_reviews.author: T.A.C.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, heavy-duty scissors. They seem well made and they’re very sharp. I also like how well they cut at their tips (for small, exact cutting).
customer_reviews.author: Never Give Up

customer_reviews.title: huge
customer_reviews.text: great big sharp all metal with rubberized coated handle cant be better
customer_reviews.author: Walter Z

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely cute
customer_reviews.text: So sleek and cute looking, works great. Cuts library/credit cards great
customer_reviews.author: DolceSmile

customer_reviews.title: I loved them
customer_reviews.text: Verry good nice and strong can cut anything with them
customer_reviews.author: Raul Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Small finger holes
customer_reviews.text: Sharp scissors, but can't get my fingers in the holes to use it. To small. For children?
customer_reviews.author: J Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: Great shears for upholstery
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp and well built. Wiss design, great shears, can't even feel it cutting through vinyl.
customer_reviews.author: leroy

customer_reviews.title: a beautiful, very well made pair of scissors!
customer_reviews.text: I am using them to cut everything around the house including some home repairs. these scissors are so sturdy I believe they would last a lifetime!
customer_reviews.author: brina

customer_reviews.title: A really good value
customer_reviews.text: These things are really nice. I didn't expect such a good product for the price. I use them to cut sail cloth, vinyl, plastic, rubber, all sorts of things. They are very sharp and seem to be holding their edge quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Cash

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Shears. Needed them to cut zip ties off multiple mail bags everyday. They do the job well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The plastic handle is great because it doesn’t hurt your hand when you are cutting. It cuts very sharp. I’m definitely recommending them and buying another pair. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: carolina hernandez

customer_reviews.title: These scissors are great! Really good especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These scissors are great! Really good especially for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Sharp
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy, steel scissors beautiful gold, goes well with my accessories. They are a little heavy and sharp, not good to have around if you have children who can access them.

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the gold color, and so nice and sharp, cuts leather with no problems

customer_reviews.title: There is nothing that I didn't like about these scissors
customer_reviews.text: They are easier to handle than I thought. There is nothing that I didn't like about these scissors. They does the job.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Well Constructed Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Well satisfied with these heavy duty scissors. Reminds me of the way quality scissors were constructed years ago. Beautiful looking also.
